data: “The thing is already on the wane,” said young Orson Vane, making a wry face over the entree, and sniffing at his glass, “and, if you ask me, I think the general digestion of society will be the better for it.”

"The thing is already on the wane," said young Orson Vane, making a wry face over the entree, and sniffing at his glass, "and, if you ask me, I think the general digestion of society will be the better for it."
